attributes.action: Stop paying benifit claiments extra cash when they decide to extend there familys
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Please STOP paying extra cash to people who are on benefits, as people like myself who go out to full time work DONT get a rise when we decide to extend our familys... So why on earth do these Bennefit Spongers get a rise every time they knock out yet another child??? Maybe you should think about a change the law to say that they must go back to work for say at least 6 months before they are elegible to get this extra paid cash before they go back onto (our tax paid) social bennefit handouts.
